Day_Job_Movement_Increase_Lesser.display_help: Your Running, Flight and Jumping speeds are increased slightly due to your benefits from your Day Job.

Day_Job_Movement_Increase_Greater.display_help: Your Running, Flight and Jumping speeds are increased slightly due to your benefits from your Day Job.

Pilot_Lesser.display_help: Your Running, Flight and Jumping speeds are increased slightly due to your benefits from your Day Job.

Pilot_Greater.display_help: Your Running, Flight and Jumping speeds are increased slightly due to your benefits from your Day Job.

Day_Job_Increase_Regeneration_Lesser.display_help: Your regeneration rate while not in combat is increased slightly due to your knowledge gained from your Day Job.

Day_Job_Increase_Regeneration_Greater.display_help: Your regeneration rate while not in combat is increased slightly due to your knowledge gained from your Day Job.

Day_Job_Increase_Endurance_Lesser.display_help: Your maximum Endurance is increased slightly due to your training from your Day Job.
Day_Job_Increase_Endurance_Lesser.display_attacker_hit: You {PowerName} and increase your maximum Endurance.

Day_Job_Increase_Endurance_Greater.display_help: Your maximum Endurance is increased slightly due to your training from your Day Job.
Day_Job_Increase_Endurance_Greater.display_attacker_hit: You {PowerName} and increase your maximum Endurance.

Day_Job_Increase_Recovery_Lesser.display_help: Your recovery rate while not in combat is increased slightly due to your knowledge gained from your Day Job.

Day_Job_Increase_Recovery_Greater.display_help: Your recovery rate while not in combat is increased slightly due to your knowledge gained from your Day Job.

Day_Job_Damage_Resistance_Lesser.display_help: Your damage resistance has been increased slightly due to your training from your Day Job.

Day_Job_Damage_Resistance_Greater.display_help: Your damage resistance has been increased slightly due to your training from your Day Job.

Day_Job_Psionic_Resistance_Lesser.display_help: Your damage resistance and defense against Psionic attacks have been increased slightly due to your training from your Day Job.

Day_Job_Psionic_Resistance_Greater.display_help: Your damage resistance and defense against Psionic attacks have been increased slightly due to your training from your Day Job.

Day_Job_ColdNegative_Resistance_Lesser.display_help: Your damage resistance and defense against both Cold and Negative Energy attacks have been increased slightly due to your training from your Day Job.

Day_Job_ColdNegative_Resistance_Greater.display_help: Your damage resistance and defense against both Cold and Negative Energy attacks have been increased slightly due to your training from your Day Job.

Day_Job_DPS_Buff_Lesser.display_help: Your damage, ToHit, and Range have been increased slightly due to your training from your Day Job.

Day_Job_DPS_Buff_Greater.display_help: Your damage, ToHit, and Range have been increased slightly due to your training from your Day Job.

Day_Job_Improved_Recharge_Time_Lesser.display_help: Your recharge rate is increased slightly due to your training from your Day Job.

Day_Job_Improved_Recharge_Time_Greater.display_help: Your recharge rate is increased slightly due to your training from your Day Job.

City_Official_Influence_Lesser.display_help: Your day job has granted you a 15% bonus to Influence upon completion of a mission as long as time remains on this power.

City_Official_Influence_Greater.display_help: Your day job has granted you a 25% bonus to Influence upon completion of a mission as long as time remains on this power.

Demagogue_Influence_Lesser.display_help: Your day job has granted you a 15% bonus to Influence upon completion of a mission as long as time remains on this power.

Demagogue_Influence_Greater.display_help: Your day job has granted you a 25% bonus to Influence upon completion of a mission as long as time remains on this power.

Banker_Influence_Lesser.display_help: Your day job has granted you a 15% bonus to Influence upon completion of a mission as long as time remains on this power.

Banker_Influence_Greater.display_help: Your day job has granted you a 25% bonus to Influence upon completion of a mission as long as time remains on this power.

Thief_Influence_Lesser.display_help: Your day job has granted you a 15% bonus to Influence upon completion of a mission as long as time remains on this power.

Thief_Influence_Greater.display_help: Your day job has granted you a 25% bonus to Influence upon completion of a mission as long as time remains on this power.

Monitor_Duty_Prestige_Lesser.display_help: Due to your time spent analyzing your Supergroup base's defenses, you will earn a Brain Storm Idea upon mission completion for as long as this power has time remaining.

Monitor_Duty_Prestige_Greater.display_help: Due to your time spent analyzing your Supergroup base's defenses, you will earn a Brain Storm Idea upon mission completion for as long as this power has time remaining.

Law_Enforcement_XP_Lesser.display_help: Your day job has granted you an additional 15% bonus to experience upon completion of a mission as long as time remains on this power.

Law_Enforcement_XP_Greater.display_help: Your day job has granted you an additional 25% bonus to experience upon completion of a mission as long as time remains on this power.

Arachnos_Agent_XP_Lesser.display_help: Your day job has granted you an additional 15% bonus to experience upon completion of a mission as long as time remains on this power.

Arachnos_Agent_XP_Greater.display_help: Your day job has granted you an additional 25% bonus to experience upon completion of a mission as long as time remains on this power.

Shop_Keeper_Enhancement.display_help: Your time working as a shop keeper has given you an eye for quality. Upon completion of a mission, while this effect has time remaining, you will be awarded an enhancement.

Smuggler_Enhancement.display_help: Your time working as a smuggler has given you a keen eye for quality goods. Upon completion of a mission, while this effect has time remaining, you will be awarded an enhancement.

Intern_Inspiration.display_help: Due to your training at your day job you will gain a Large Inspiration upon completion of a mission as long as this effect has time remaining.

Crey_Employee_Inspiration.display_help: Due to your training at your day job you will gain a Large Inspiration upon completion of a mission as long as this effect has time remaining.

Scavenger_Inspiration.display_help: Due to your training at your day job you will gain a Large Inspiration upon completion of a mission as long as this effect has time remaining.

Scholar_Tech_Salvage.display_help: Due to your training at your day job you will gain a random piece of tech salvage upon completion of a mission as long as this effect has time remaining.

Auctioneer_Teleporter_Lesser.display_help: Due to your connections at Wentworth's you have been granted quick access to Wentworth's via teleporter. This power will allow you to teleport to Wentworth's once every 15 minutes.

Auctioneer_Teleporter_Greater.display_help: Due to your connections at Wentworth's you have been granted quick access to Wentworth's via teleporter. This power will allow you to teleport to Wentworth's once every 5 minutes.

Marketeer_Teleporter_Lesser.display_help: Due to your connections in the Black Market you have been granted quick access to the Black Market via teleporter. This power will allow you to teleport to the Black Market once every 15 minutes.

Marketeer_Teleporter_Greater.display_help: Due to your connections in the Black Market you have been granted quick access to the Black Market via teleporter. This power will allow you to teleport to the Black Market once every 5 minutes.

Vanguard_Recruit_Merit_Lesser.display_help: Due to your diligent work with Vanguard you will receive 1 bonus Vanguard Merit upon mission completion as long as this effect has time remaining.

Vanguard_Recruit_Merit_Greater.display_help: Due to your diligent work with Vanguard you will receive 2 bonus Vanguard Merits upon mission completion as long as this effect has time remaining.

Mender_Recipe.display_help: Due to your training with Ouroboros you will receive a chance to gain an invention recipe upon mission completion for as long as this effect has time remaining.

Survivalist_Recipe.display_help: Due to your time spent surviving in First Ward you will receive a chance to gain an invention recipe upon mission completion for as long as this effect has time remaining.

Midnighter_Arcane_Salvage.display_help: Due to your training at your day job you will gain a random piece of arcane salvage upon completion of a mission as long as this effect has time remaining.

Grave_Digger_XP_Debt_Lesser.display_help: Due to your day job training you will incur 20% less XP debt upon defeat as long as time remains on this power.

Grave_Digger_XP_Debt_Greater.display_help: Due to your day job training you will incur 30% less XP debt upon defeat as long as time remains on this power.

Grave_Robber_XP_Debt_Lesser.display_help: Due to your day job training you will incur 20% less XP debt upon defeat as long as time remains on this power.

Grave_Robber_XP_Debt_Greater.display_help: Due to your day job training you will incur 30% less XP debt upon defeat as long as time remains on this power.

Day_Job_Jet_Pack.display_help: Your hard work from your Day Job has given you access to a Jet Pack. The Traveler's Jetpack will allow you to fly for as long as there is enough fuel. Logging out in Grandville or The Shadow Shard will earn you additional usage time for your Traveler's Jet Pack.

Architect_Ticket_Lesser.display_help: Your day job will grant you a 5% ticket bonus upon completion of a Mission Architect mission as long as time remains on this power.

Architect_Ticket_Greater.display_help: Your day job will grant you a 10% ticket bonus upon completion of a Mission Architect mission as long as time remains on this power.

Warden_Baton.display_help: Your authority gained from working in both law enforcement and for the city government has earned you usage of a Baton. Foes struck in melee combat with this weapon will suffer minor damage, but each strike has a high chance of disorienting the target. Additional uses of this power can be earned by logging out in either City Hall or a Police Station. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Very Fast

messages.display_attacker_hit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.

Security_Guard_Tear_Gas.display_help: Your time as a security guard and police officer has earned you access to Tear Gas. Foes affected by the gas will be left choking and held for a short duration. Additional Tear Gas canisters can be earned by logging out in a Police Station or Vault. Recharge: Long.
Security_Guard_Tear_Gas.display_target_help: The Tear Gas has left you choking and helpless.

Scientist_Sleep_Grenade.display_help: Your time studying various sciences has earned you access to Sleep Grenades. Foes affected by the gas will be put to sleep for a short while. Sleeping foes will awaken if they suffer damage. Additional Sleep Gas canisters can be earned by logging out in a University, inside Portal Corps (Heroes) or inside the Crey Industries building (Villains). Recharge: Long.
Scientist_Sleep_Grenade.display_target_help: You have been put to sleep by the Sleep Gas.

Doctor_Revive_Ally.display_help: Your time spent studying medicine has gained you access to a medical kit that allows you to revive a nearby fallen ally. Allies revived by this power will be healed for a small portion of their health and be protected from XP Debt for 15 seconds. Additional charges of this power can be earned by logging out in a hospital or university. Recharge: Very Long.
Doctor_Revive_Ally.display_target_help: You have been revived. You are protected from XP Debt for 15 seconds.
Doctor_Revive_Ally.display_attacker_hit: You revive {PlayerDest} from the brink of death. They are very weak and needs to rest.
Doctor_Revive_Ally.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} returns you from the brink of death. However, you are very weak, and must rest for a while to regain your strength.
Doctor_Revive_Ally.display_confirm: {PlayerSource} would like to Revive you. You will be revived with XP Debt protection, a moderate amount of health, but no endurance. Do you Accept?

messages.display_attacker_hit: You heal {PlayerDest} with {PowerName} for {Damage} points of damage over time.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} heals you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of damage over time.

Alchemists_Potion.display_help: Your knowledge of both medicine and magic has taught you how to heal your allies. Use this power on an ally to recover a portion of their health. Additional charges of Vitalize can be gained by logging out in a Hospital or the Midnighter's Club. Recharge: Long.

Soldier_Grenade.display_help: Your military training with Vanguard and from being on Patrol has earned you access to Fragmentation Grenades. When thrown, these grenades will deal moderate lethal and smashing damage to all enemies within the area of effect and have a chance to knock them back. Additional grenades can be earned by logging out in a Vanguard Base or while on Patrol. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow.
Soldier_Grenade.display_short_help: Targeted AoE Moderate DMG (Lethal/Smashing), Foe Knockback

messages.display_attacker_hit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.

messages.display_attacker_hit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.

messages.display_attacker_hit: You knock {PlayerDest} off their feet with your {PowerName}!
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} knocks you off your feet with their {PowerName}!

messages.display_attacker_hit: You knock {PlayerDest} off their feet with your {PowerName}!
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} knocks you off your feet with their {PowerName}!

Rapid_Response_Member_Teleport.display_help: You have earned the ability to teleport back to your supergroup base from your diligent duty on patrol and guarding your base. Using this power will teleport you back to your supergroup and it can be used once every 15 minutes. Additional uses of this power can be gained by logging out on Patrol or back at your Supergroup base. Recharge: Very Long.

Trend_Setter_Placate.display_help: Your time spent hob-nobbing at Pocket D has earned you the ability to convince enemies to temporarily not attack you. You can placate a single foe at range and call off their attack briefly. You can earn additional uses of this power by logging out at Pocket D or a Tailor. Recharge: Very Long.

messages.display_victim_hit: You have been Placated and cannot target {PlayerSource}.

Time_Traveler.display_help: Traveling back and forth through time is not without its benefits. You have a slightly increased attack rate and are resistant to both slows, and will usually protect yourself from being teleported by enemies, this power is always on. You can gain additional time for this effect by logging out in either Cimerora. or Ouroboros.
Time_Traveler.display_attacker_hit: Your {PowerName} has increased your rate of attack.

Archaelogist_Rune.display_help: Your time spent studying ancient relics and magical artifacts has earned you access to the Rune of Purification. This rune will deal moderate energy damage to a target, non-human targets will suffer additional damage. You can gain additional charges of this power by logging off in a Graveyard or the Midnighter's Club. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Long.
Archaelogist_Rune.display_short_help: Ranged, Moderate DMG(Energy)/Special vs. Non Human

messages.display_attacker_hit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage.

messages.display_attacker_hit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage.

Combat_Shield.display_help: Your rigorous training in the arena and on the battlefield has given you access to the Combat Shield. While this power is active you have increased defense to Lethal, Smashing and Energy attacks. Additional time can be gained on this power by logging out in either a PvP zone or in an arena. Recharge: Fast.
Combat_Shield.display_attacker_hit: You Combat Shield increased you Defense to Lethal, Smashing, and to some degree, Energy attacks.

Web_Weaver_Grenade.display_help: Your work with Arachnos has earned you access to web grenades. When these grenades come in contact with their target they will immobilize them as well reducing their movement and attack speed as well as preventing them from flying. Additional grenades can be earned by logging out in an Arachnos Base or the Arachnos Building in Port Oakes. Recharge: Fast.
Web_Weaver_Grenade.display_target_help: You have been caught in a web. You cannot move or fly and your attack speed is reduced.

Black_Ops_Smoke_Grenade.display_help: Your training from working with Arachnos and several successful heists has earned you access to Smoke Bombs. The Smoke Bomb envelops all those in the affected area in a cloud of smoke. Most foes will not be able to see past normal melee range, although some may have better perception. If the villains are attacked, they will be alerted to your presence, but will suffer a penalty to their chance to hit. Additional bombs can be earned by logging out at an Arachnos Base or at a Vault. Recharge: Long.
Black_Ops_Smoke_Grenade.display_target_help: Your visual range and Chance to hit has been reduced by the Smoke Bomb.

Master_Architect_Power.display_help: Your college education combined with extensive knowledge of the Architect system has taught you how to work around virtual defeats. You're able to shrug off the effects of simulated defeat once every 10 minutes while on Architect missions. This will revive you with a small amount of hit points and no endurance, but you'll have 90 seconds of XP Debt Protection. Additional charges can be earned by logging out at Architect Entertainment or in a university.

Analysts_Teleporter.display_help: Your knowledge of portal technologies has earned you access to the Analyst's Teleporter power. Using this power you'll be able to teleport great distances instantaneously by clicking this power and selecting a distant location. You will earn charges for this power by logging out in the Rift Enclosure.

City_Official_Message.display_help: Logging out in the City Hall will earn you an Influence bonus after mission completion for a short time. The more time spent logged out, the longer the duration will last, up to a maximum of two hours. After 100 hours of logged out time you will earn the City Official Day Job badge, that will enhance the Influence bonus granted by logging out here.
City_Official_Message.display_target_help: Logging out in the City Hall will earn you an Influence bonus after mission completion for a short time. The more time spent logged out, the longer the duration will last, up to a maximum of two hours. After 100 hours of logged out time you will earn the City Official Day Job badge, that will enhance the Influence bonus granted by logging out here.

Law_Enforcement_Message.display_help: Logging out in a Police Station will earn you an Experience Point bonus after mission completion for a short time. The more time spent logged out, the longer the duration will last, up to a maximum of two hours. After 100 hours of logged out time you will earn the Law Enforcer Day Job badge that will enhance the Experience Point bonus granted by logging out here.
Law_Enforcement_Message.display_target_help: Logging out in a Police Station will earn you an Experience Point bonus after mission completion for a short time. The more time spent logged out, the longer the duration will last, up to a maximum of two hours. After 100 hours of logged out time you will earn the Law Enforcer Day Job badge that will enhance the Experience Point bonus granted by logging out here.

Commuter_Message.display_help: Logging out in a Train Station will earn you a travel speed bonus for a short time. The more time spent logged out, the longer the duration will last, up to a maximum of two hours. After 100 hours of logged out time you will earn the Commuter Day Job badge that will enhance the travel speed bonus granted by logging out here.
Commuter_Message.display_target_help: Logging out in a Train Station will earn you a travel speed bonus for a short time. The more time spent logged out, the longer the duration will last, up to a maximum of two hours. After 100 hours of logged out time you will earn the Commuter Day Job badge that will enhance the travel speed bonus granted by logging out here.

Shop_Keeper_Message.display_help: Logging out in a Store Lobby will grant you a random Enhancement after mission completion for a short time. The more time spent logged out, the longer the duration will last, up to a maximum of two hours. After 100 hours of logged out time you will earn the Shop Keeper Day Job badge.
Shop_Keeper_Message.display_target_help: Logging out in a Store Lobby will grant you a random Enhancement after mission completion for a short time. The more time spent logged out, the longer the duration will last, up to a maximum of two hours. After 100 hours of logged out time you will earn the Shop Keeper Day Job badge.

Dimensional_Explorer_Message.display_help: Logging out in the Shadow Shard will grant you a Jetpack power for a short time. The more time spent logged out, the longer the duration will last, up to a maximum of thirty minutes. After 100 hours of logged out time you will earn the Dimensional Explorer Day Job badge.
Dimensional_Explorer_Message.display_target_help: Logging out in the Shadow Shard will grant you a Jetpack power for a short time. The more time spent logged out, the longer the duration will last, up to a maximum of thirty minutes. After 100 hours of logged out time you will earn the Dimensional Explorer Day Job badge.

Intern_Message.display_help: Logging out in one of the Portal Corps buildings will grant you a random Large Inspiration after mission completion for a short time. The more time spent logged out, the longer the duration will last, up to a maximum of two hours. After 100 hours of logged out time you will earn the Intern Day Job badge.
Intern_Message.display_target_help: Logging out in one of the Portal Corps buildings will grant you a random Large Inspiration after mission completion for a short time. The more time spent logged out, the longer the duration will last, up to a maximum of two hours. After 100 hours of logged out time you will earn the Intern Day Job badge.

Caregiver_Message.display_help: Logging out in a Hospital will earn you an out of combat Regeneration bonus for a short time. The more time spent logged out, the longer the duration will last, up to a maximum of two hours. After 100 hours of logged out time you will earn a the Caregiver (Hero) or Pain Specialist (Villain) Day Job badge, that will enhance the Regeneration bonus granted by logging out here.
Caregiver_Message.display_target_help: Logging out in a Hospital will earn you an out of combat Regeneration bonus for a short time. The more time spent logged out, the longer the duration will last, up to a maximum of two hours. After 100 hours of logged out time you will earn a the Caregiver (Hero) or Pain Specialist (Villain) Day Job badge, that will enhance the Regeneration bonus granted by logging out here.

Scholar_Message.display_help: Logging out in a University will grant you a random piece of Tech Salvage after mission completion for a short time. The more time spent logged out, the longer the duration will last, up to a maximum of two hours. After 100 hours of logged out time you will earn the Professor Day Job badge.
Scholar_Message.display_target_help: Logging out in a University will grant you a random piece of Tech Salvage after mission completion for a short time. The more time spent logged out, the longer the duration will last, up to a maximum of two hours. After 100 hours of logged out time you will earn the Professor Day Job badge.

On_Patrol_Message.display_help: You go On Patrol by logging out anywhere. While logged out your character will gain a period of double experience gain when you log back in. The longer the character is logged out the greater the duration of this effect. It takes a total of 10 days of logged out time to gain the maximum amount of On Patrol double experience, which will account for an entire level of double experience. After being logged out for a total of thirty days, the character will earn the Patroller (Hero) or Criminal (Villain) badge.
On_Patrol_Message.display_target_help: You go On Patrol by logging out anywhere. While logged out your character will gain a period of double experience gain when you log back in. The longer the character is logged out the greater the duration of this effect. It takes a total of 10 days of logged out time to gain the maximum amount of On Patrol double experience, which will account for an entire level of double experience. After being logged out for a total of thirty days, the character will earn the Patroller (Hero) or Criminal (Villain) badge.

Banker_Message.display_help: Logging out in a Vault will earn you an Influence/Infamy bonus after mission completion for a short time. The more time spent logged out, the longer the duration will last, up to a maximum of two hours. After 100 hours of logged out time you will earn the Banker (Hero) or Thief (Villain) Day Job badge, that will enhance the Influence/Infamy bonus granted by logging out here.
Banker_Message.display_target_help: Logging out in a Vault will earn you an Influence/Infamy bonus after mission completion for a short time. The more time spent logged out, the longer the duration will last, up to a maximum of two hours. After 100 hours of logged out time you will earn the Banker (Hero) or Thief (Villain) Day Job badge, that will enhance the Influence/Infamy bonus granted by logging out here.

Clubber_Message.display_help: Logging out in Pocket D will earn you an out of combat Recovery bonus for a short time. The more time spent logged out, the longer the duration will last, up to a maximum of two hours. After 100 hours of logged out time you will earn a the Clubber Day Job badge, that will enhance the Recovery bonus granted by logging out here.
Clubber_Message.display_target_help: Logging out in Pocket D will earn you an out of combat Recovery bonus for a short time. The more time spent logged out, the longer the duration will last, up to a maximum of two hours. After 100 hours of logged out time you will earn a the Clubber Day Job badge, that will enhance the Recovery bonus granted by logging out here.

Auctioneer_Message.display_help: Logging out in Wentworth's or near the Black Market will grant you a power that will allow you to teleport back to the auction house. By logging out near Wentworth's or the Black Market you earn charges toward this power. After 100 hours of logged out time you will earn the Day Trader (Hero) or Marketeer (Villain) Day Job badge, that will increase the rate at which you receive additional time for your Auction House teleporter.
Auctioneer_Message.display_target_help: Logging out in Wentworth's or near the Black Market will grant you a power that will allow you to teleport back to the auction house. By logging out near Wentworth's or the Black Market you earn charges toward this power. After 100 hours of logged out time you will earn the Day Trader (Hero) or Marketeer (Villain) Day Job badge, that will increase the rate at which you receive additional time for your Auction House teleporter.

Vanguard_Recruit_Message.display_help: Logging out in the Vanguard will grant you a Vanguard Merit after mission completion for a short time. The more time spent logged out, the longer the duration will last, up to a maximum of two hours. After 100 hours of logged out time you will earn the Vanguard Recruit Day Job badge which will double the bonus of this effect, granting two Vanguard Merits upon mission completion.
Vanguard_Recruit_Message.display_target_help: Logging out in the Vanguard will grant you a Vanguard Merit after mission completion for a short time. The more time spent logged out, the longer the duration will last, up to a maximum of two hours. After 100 hours of logged out time you will earn the Vanguard Recruit Day Job badge which will double the bonus of this effect, granting two Vanguard Merits upon mission completion.

Mender_Message.display_help: Logging out in Ouroboros will grant you a chance to receive a random Invention Recipe after mission completion for a short time. The more time spent logged out, the longer the duration will last, up to a maximum of two hours. After 100 hours of logged out time you will earn the Chronologist Day Job badge.
Mender_Message.display_target_help: Logging out in Ouroboros will grant you a chance to receive a random Invention Recipe after mission completion for a short time. The more time spent logged out, the longer the duration will last, up to a maximum of two hours. After 100 hours of logged out time you will earn the Chronologist Day Job badge.

Midnighter_Message.display_help: Logging out in the Midnighter's Club will grant you a random piece of Arcane Salvage after mission completion for a short time. The more time spent logged out, the longer the duration will last, up to a maximum of two hours. After 100 hours of logged out time you will earn the Midnighter Day Job badge.
Midnighter_Message.display_target_help: Logging out in the Midnighter's Club will grant you a random piece of Arcane Salvage after mission completion for a short time. The more time spent logged out, the longer the duration will last, up to a maximum of two hours. After 100 hours of logged out time you will earn the Midnighter Day Job badge.

Duelist_Message.display_help: Logging out in an Arena will earn you bonus to your maximum Endurance for a short time. The more time spent logged out, the longer the duration will last, up to a maximum of two hours. After 100 hours of logged out time you will earn the Duelist Day Job badge that will enhance the Maximum Endurance bonus granted by logging out here.
Duelist_Message.display_target_help: Logging out in an Arena will earn you bonus to your maximum Endurance for a short time. The more time spent logged out, the longer the duration will last, up to a maximum of two hours. After 100 hours of logged out time you will earn the Duelist Day Job badge that will enhance the Maximum Endurance bonus granted by logging out here.

Clothes_Horse_Message.display_help: Logging out at a Tailor will earn you a number of 25% tailor fee discount coupons The more time spent logged out, the more coupons you will receive up to a total of 10. After 100 hours of logged out time you will earn the Fashion Designer badge, that will increase the rate that you receive the tailor fee discount coupons.
Clothes_Horse_Message.display_target_help: Logging out at a Tailor will earn you a number of 25% tailor fee discount coupons The more time spent logged out, the more coupons you will receive up to a total of 10. After 100 hours of logged out time you will earn the Fashion Designer badge, that will increase the rate that you receive the tailor fee discount coupons.

Cimeroran_Message.display_help: Logging out in Cimerora will earn you bonus to your Damage Resistance for a short time. The more time spent logged out, the longer the duration will last, up to a maximum of two hours. After 100 hours of logged out time you will earn the Cimeroran Day Job badge that will enhance the Damage Resistance bonus granted by logging out here.
Cimeroran_Message.display_target_help: Logging out in Cimerora will earn you bonus to your Damage Resistance for a short time. The more time spent logged out, the longer the duration will last, up to a maximum of two hours. After 100 hours of logged out time you will earn the Cimeroran Day Job badge that will enhance the Damage Resistance bonus granted by logging out here.

Griefer_Message.display_help: Logging out in a PvP zone will earn you bonus to your Recharge for a short time. The more time spent logged out, the longer the duration will last, up to a maximum of two hours. After 100 hours of logged out time you will earn the Predator Day Job badge that will enhance the Recharge bonus granted by logging out here.

Portal_Analyst_Message.display_help: Logging out in the Rift Enclosure will earn you charges for a Self Teleportation power. The longer you log out, the more charges you will earn, up to a total of 30 charges. After 100 hours of logged out time you will earn the Portal Analyst Day Job badge, that will increase the rate that charges are earned.

Survivalist_Message.display_help: Logging out in the Survivor Compound teaches you how to get by in a decimated wasteland, earning you a bonus chance to earn recipes on mission complete for a short time when you log back in. The more time spent logged out, the longer the duration will last, up to a maximum of two hours. After 100 hours of logged out time you will earn the Survivalist Day Job badge.

Dark_Astoria_Message.display_name: Day Job: Cold Hand of Death
Dark_Astoria_Message.display_help: Logging out in Dark Astoria inures you to the presence of Mot, granting you a bonus to your defense and resistance to both Cold and Negative Energy attacks for a short time. The more time spent logged out, the longer the duration will last, up to a maximum of two hours. After 100 hours of logged out time you will earn the Cold Hand of Death Day Job badge.
